channel.title: Python on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Premarkdown Plugins
item.description: I’m working on a preprocessor for Markdown documents. I write all my books in Markdown, so this is something I have wanted to do for a while, to scratch a few itches I have.

item.title: Fluent Python
item.description: I just finished reading Fluent Python. This is a really nice book on Python programming. It is not an introduction to Python programming, and it is not about specific packages, such as SciPy or Scikit-learn.
